cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

exm.mng: menfolk (collective term for men of different generations), husbands and their fathers etc
Brothers!, brethren, dude (colloquial), brother (diminutive form of address between males)
